names.english: powder to support the interior worth a thousand gold pieces
names.commonEnglish: Powder to Support the Interior Worth a Thousand Gold Pieces

actions: Tonifies Qi and Blood, promotes the discharge of pus, generates flesh and expels toxins.
With Ren Shen, for Qi Deficiency.
With Dang Gui, for Qi and Blood Deficiency with chronic non-healing sores.
With Dang Gui and Rou Gui, for flat sores that do not pustulate or ulcers that do not heal.
With Ren Shen, Chuan Xiong, Bai Zhi, and Fang Feng, for chronic sores with underlying Deficiency.
Tonifies Qi.
Tonifies, invigorates and harmonizes the Blood, disperses Cold, reduces swelling, expels pus, generates flesh and alleviates pain.
With Huang Qi, for Qi and Blood Deficiency and ulcerated abscesses with insufficient drainage or which drain a clear thin discharge.
With Shu Di Huang, for Heat symptoms due to Yin Deficiency and Devastated Blood.
With Huang Qi, Ren Shen, Shu Di Huang and Rou Gui, expels pus and generates flesh in chronic non-healing sores.
Invigorates the Blood, promotes the movement of Qi and alleviates pain.
With Dang Gui, harmonizes, nourishes and invigorates the Blood and disperses Blood Stasis.
Expels Wind-Dampness and alleviates pain.
Expels pus.
Expels Wind, eliminates Dampness, dispels Cold, alleviates pain, reduces swelling, eliminates toxins and expels pus.
With Chuan Xiong, for headache.
Promotes the movement of Qi downward, dries Dampness and transforms Phlegm.
With Ren Shen and Gan Cao, for distention and fullness due to Deficiency Cold.
Disperses deep Cold, warms the channels, unblocks the channels and vessels, assists the generation of Qi and Blood and alleviates pain.
With Huang Qi and Dang Gui, for Yin-type boils due to Qi and Blood Deficiency especially those that form but do not ulcerate.
Moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs.
Invigorates the Blood
Harmonizes the Stomach
Tonifies Deficiency
Detoxifies
Generates flesh
syndromes: Toxic swellings in patients with Cold and Deficient constitutions

symptoms: Harness and nodules with pus and swelling

contraindications: Contraindicated for those with Heat (red, hot and painful swellings).

modifications.purpose: inability to eat due to swelling and pain
